Opened in 2010, the Burj Khalifa in Dubai is the tallest building in the world.

The closest planet to earth is Venus. It would take over 4 years to travel there by plane.
There are 9 planets that circle the sun. They are divided into two groups: the inner planets (Mercury, Venus,Earth, and Mars) and the outer planets (Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, and Pluto).
